name: lootman
description: A set of scripts designed to gather the requisite resources for the release of LootMan and package them.

scripts.collect: npm run collect:resources && npm run collect:dll && npm run collect:papyrus && npm run collect:fomod-files
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run collect && npm run compile:papyrus && npm run archive2 && npm run make:fomod

author: EideeHi
